transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ma'am, Rahul is speaking, ma'am.
Customer: Achha, kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, yes.
Executive: Ma'am, I am speaking from MS Enterprises. You have an account with us, right?
Customer: Okay, okay, haan, theek hai. Bataiye, good afternoon, kaise hain?
Executive: Yes, yes. I was telling that we need to add a number and get the application installed for them.
Customer: Theek hai. Aapne sir, number kya tha, maine type kiya tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi, woh abhi mere sathi hai, unko ek humne dusra company ka ek number laake diya hai.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Toh aap mujhe abhi thoda bata dijiye sir, ma'am.
Customer: Haan, main bata deti hoon, just one minute, sir.
Executive: Ek minute dijiye. Abhi aapne IndiaMART open kar rakha hai kya?
Executive: Haan, mera toh open hai. Mera open hai, mera isme phone ke andar opened hai.
Customer: Okay. So, main aapko guide kar deti hoon. Aapne, is it possible ki ek baar zoom meeting pe connect kar loon aapko main guide karne ke liye?
Executive: Kispe?
Customer: Ya phir main aapko batati ja rahi hoon step by step, aap dekh lijiye. Aap mobile mein.
Executive: Haan, step by step bata dijiye nahi toh.
Customer: Theek hai, main bata deti hoon sir. Aapne open kar lijiye, aapko main guide kar deti hoon, sir.
Executive: Ji, ji bolte jaiye ma'am, thoda fatafat.
Customer: Okay. Settings pe click kariye sir aur setting mein aapko PNS call settings ka option dikha hoga sir.
Executive: Ek second, settings mein, maine left mein upar tap kiya, uske baad mein settings mein main gaya, haan, settings mein gaya.
Customer: Wahan par dekhiye preferred number settings karke aa raha hoga sir.
Executive: PNS, PNS, okay.
Customer: PNS please.
Executive: Yes. Click kiya. Abhi kya aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Ab mujhe nahi, do number, do numbers hai na toh mujhe first number, matlab abhi first number pe mujhe ma'am ka number karna tha.
Customer: Matlab aap apna number hatana chahte ho?
Executive: Nahi nahi, mera number aa jayega second pe. Nahi, mera chalo theek hai, primary number mera ho, par second number pe main aur koi number karna chahta hoon.
Customer: Haan, aap second bhi kar dijiye, main aapko guide kar rahi hoon. Aap jo second mein abhi Ankit sir ka number add hai, toh aap usme ek add number mode pe click kariye. Add mode pe click kariye.
Executive: Ek second, achha, okay, okay. Mobile number batao aap.
Customer: System possible ho payega kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi, isme ho jayega ma'am, koi dikkat hi nahi hai na.
Customer: Haan, 92 431 22 037.
Executive: Haan, 92 431 22 037. Theek hai, yeh maine kar diya. Okay. Ab ek OTP aayega mere paas. OTP kar diya maine.
Executive: 18
Executive: Dekho aapke paas ek number aaya hoga OTP.
Executive: 68 68
Customer: Theek hai. Haan, teen number humne add kar liye.
Customer: Ab isme.
Executive: Haan, haan ho gaye, teeno number add ho gaye ma'am.
Customer: Okay. Ek minute sir, line pe rahiyega. Aapke abhi system hai kya abhi available aapke paas sir?
Executive: Ma'am, system ki koi zarurat nahi hai. Aap toh humko bas itna bata do ki ab inko add, matlab ab main inke phone mein kaise install karke aur isko chalu kar doon bas.
Customer: Install aap kar dijiye. IndiaMART ka application install kariye sir.
Executive: Nahi toh usme koi do type ki application thi kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi, ek normal IndiaMART ki application hogi. Login aap apne number se kariye sir. Aapke
Customer: Sir IndiaMART pe aap login aap apne number se hi karna kyunki primary number aapka hai. Jo bhi primary number rehta hai usi se hi login hota hai IndiaMART ko. Theek hai sir, toh login aapke number se hoga.
Executive: Haan, theek hai, login IndiaMART open kar lo.
Executive: Aap le lo na, jao. Khud hi bulwa lo.
Executive: Nahi. Abhi yeh ek second mein, maine IndiaMART open kar liya, IndiaMART open kar liya.
Customer: IndiaMART hi hai.
Executive: Achha. IndiaMART open kar liya ma'am maine.
Customer: Kindly sir, usi aap apne number se login.
Executive: Ma'am ne primary, nahi nahi ma'am ne primary number mere login bhi kar liya hai unka, already logged in hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap shayad mere hisab se ab call aa jayenge aapko, pata hai? Haan.
Customer: Bilkul, bilkul. Ma'am ke paas toh aa jayenge par ek cheez aur kar dijiye sir. Abhi aap ek inko ek doubt hai.
Executive: Ma'am one by one bolenge na ma'am toh thoda theek rahega.
Customer: Haan haan, aap pehle doubt bataiye.
Executive: Doubt kuch nahi hai, unhone already login kar liya hai, maine inka number add kar liya toh mere hisab se ab unko call toh aa jayenge, koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab inko kuch doubt hai woh bata dijiye inko ma'am ko, yeh lijiye. Ma'am main bol rahi thi ki isme na jo upar woh burger icon hai, usme primary number sir ka hai, right?
Customer: Right.
Customer: Hello. And secondary number, bilkul, primary number sir ka hai.
Customer: Toh ab koi customer jab call karega toh woh but update hua nahi hai isme, other information mein second number Ankit ka hi hai.
Executive: Nahi woh hone do. Second number Ankit ka hai aur third number aapka hai. Abhi kya hoga ma'am, jaise aapke buyer aapko jab bhi call kare, ek number main aapko save kara dungi phone mein, aap chaho toh note down kar lijiye. 8042994299. Is number se call aata hai. Yeh buyer number hai ma'am. Is number se call aayega aapke paas, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai, aap number bata do.
Customer: 80. Haan. 4299.
Executive: 80 4299 4299 hai hai. IndiaMART buyer naam se save kar lo.
Customer: Okay, theek hai. Okay, save rakhna. Yeh kya hai buyer ke number se call aata hai. Buyer ka single ek hi number rahega bas. Isse kabhi koi call aaye please mat kariye. Ek cheez aur ek cheez batana tha aapko. Ek baar again aap burger icon pe click karenge.
Customer: Theek hai, okay, okay, okay ma'am.
Customer: Haan, ma'am ek baar again aap burger icon pe click kariye please.
Executive: Burger icon, nahi nahi hamara koi woh nahi hai.
Customer: Ma'am main bata rahi hoon aapko kya.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap boliye na.
Customer: Okay, usme aapki primary details aa rahi hogi. Ek baar aapka jo number aa raha hai wahan par click karenge toh wahan par additional details kuch add karne ke liye aa raha hai kya?
Executive: Ma'am ek kaam karo na, aawaz bahut kat rahi hai. Main aapko 10 minute mein ma'am ko bolta hoon main lagane ke liye, theek hai wapas se. Woh number toh add ho gaya hai, baki main aapko unke
Executive: Isko aawaz bahut, aapke yahan se na aawaz hi nahi aati hai, pata nahi kya hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi, abhi woh mujhe clear aa rahi hai, bataiye sir.
Executive: Nahi bahut, aapko toh aati hai, hum toh bahut acche network mein hai. Aapke wahan se hamesha hi aise kat kat ke aati hai.
Customer: Ji ji sir. Sir aapne mujhe direct number pe call kiya sir. Ya aap customer care number pe call karte isliye yeh problem aata hai.
Executive: Aap bataiye na, woh main Batul ma'am ko de deta hoon, woh aapko call kar legi, bataiye.
Customer: Aap mera number note kar lijiye sir, 9311.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 9311 68 68 3525.
Executive: 35 25, theek hai.
Customer: Yes sir.
Customer: Main lock karke aa jaungi na ek baar mein. Kya? Aa jaana na wapas abhi toh chalo.
Customer: Sir main ek cheez aur bol rahi thi ki main abhi aapka concern close kar doon. Aapne customer care pe call kiya tha toh aapka ek concern raise ho gaya tha.
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Aapne customer care pe call kiya tha toh concern raise ho gaya tha. Main ticket close kar doon aapka?
Executive: Haan haan, bilkul.
Customer: Theek hai. Sir aapke paas ek feedback ka message aayega mail par toh please us pe satisfied kariye.
Executive: Kar dunga, kar dunga, haan main samajh gaya.
Customer: Okay, okay. Thank you so much sir. Thank you. Baki main ma'am se baat kar leti hoon, unko guide kar deti hoon.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help adding a number.

- Customer wants to know how to install application.

- Customer wants to know about primary number.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to add number.

- Executive explained installation process.

- Executive explained primary number login process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- number, installation, login, primary number
